zaplutus: <entryFree id="n51518" type="greek" key="za_plu_tus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zāplūtus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos>, = <foreign lang="greek">za/ploutos</foreign>, <sense id="n51518.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">very rich</hi>, <bibl default="NO"><author>Petr.</author> 37</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zea: <entryFree id="n51519" type="main" key="ze_a"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zēa</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zeia)</foreign>. <sense id="n51519.0" n="I" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">A kind of grain</hi>, <hi rend="ital">spelt</hi>: Triticum spelta, Linn. (pure Lat. alica); <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:18:81 sq" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 18, 8, 19, § 81 sq.</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Hier.</author> in Isa. 9, 28, 25</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> in Ezech. 4, 9</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n51519.1" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">A kind of rosemary</hi>, <bibl default="NO"><author>App.</author> Herb. 97</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zelanter: <entryFree id="n51520" type="main" key="ze_lanter"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zēlanter</orth>, <pos>adv.</pos> <etym>zelo</etym>, <sense id="n51520.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">zealously</hi> (late Lat.), Ven. Fort. Vit. Patern. 3.</sense></entryFree>
zelator: <entryFree id="n51521" type="main" key="ze_la_tor"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zēlātor</orth>, <itype>ōris</itype>, <gen>m.</gen> <etym>id.</etym>, <sense id="n51521.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a zealous person</hi>, <hi rend="ital">a zealot</hi>, Ven. Carm. 5, 6, 12; <bibl default="NO"><author>Ambros.</author> in Psa. 51, 15</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zelivira: <entryFree id="n51522" type="spur" key="ze_li^vi^ra"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zēlĭvĭra</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, a false read. for caelibi, <bibl default="NO"><author>Tert.</author> Exhort. Cast. 9</bibl>.</entryFree>
zelo: <entryFree id="n51523" type="greek" key="ze_lo"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zēlo</orth>, <itype>āre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, = <foreign lang="greek">zhlo/w</foreign>. <sense id="n51523.0" n="I" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">To love with zeal</hi> or <hi rend="ital">ardently</hi> (eccl. Lat.): <cit><quote lang="la">populum summo pietatis amore,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Tert.</author> Carm. adv. Marc. 4, 36</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2468,001:Conf. 1:7" default="NO"><author>Aug.</author> Conf. 1, 7</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n51523.1" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">To be jealous of</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">non zeles mulierem sinus tui,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Vulg.</author> Ecclus. 9, 1</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n51523.2" n="III" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">To be zealous for</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">zelat zelum legis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0527,023:2:58" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vulg.</author> 1 Macc. 2, 58</bibl></cit>.—Also in <hi rend="ital">dep.</hi> form: zelatus est legem. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0527,023:2:26" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vulg.</author> 1 Macc. 2, 26</bibl>.—<usg type="style"><hi rend="ital">Absol.</hi></usg>: <cit><quote lang="la">zelatus est pro Deo suo,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0527,004:25:13" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vulg.</author> Num. 25, 13</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
zelotes: <entryFree id="n51524" type="greek" key="ze_lo_tes"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zēlōtes</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zhlwth/s</foreign>, <sense id="n51524.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">one that loves with jealousy</hi>, <hi rend="ital">one that is jealous</hi> (eccl. Lat.); <cit><quote lang="la">of God,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Tert.</author> adv. Marc. 1, 28</bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO">4, 25</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0527,002:20:5 al" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vulg.</author> Exod. 20, 5 al.</bibl></sense></entryFree>
zelotypa: <entryFree id="n51525" type="main" key="ze_lo^ty^pa"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zēlŏtypa</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, v. zelotypus, 2.</entryFree>
zelotypia: <entryFree id="n51526" type="greek" key="ze_lo^ty^pi^a"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zēlŏtypĭa</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zhlotupi/a</foreign>, <sense id="n51526.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">jealousy</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:25:75" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 25, 7, 37, § 75</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0527,004:5:14" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vulg.</author> Num. 5, 14</bibl> (in <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,049:4:8:18" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Tusc. 4, 8, 18</bibl>, and <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0400,001:10:8" default="NO"><author>Att.</author> 10, 8</bibl>, A, 1, written as Greek).</sense></entryFree>
zelotypus: <entryFree id="n51527" type="greek" key="ze_lo^ty^pus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zēlŏtypus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos>, = <foreign lang="greek">zhlo/tupos</foreign>, <sense id="n51527.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">jealous</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">larba,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1276,001:5:45" default="NO"><author>Juv.</author> 5, 45</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">moechae,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1276,001:6:278" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 6, 278</bibl></cit>.—As <hi rend="ital">substt.</hi> </sense><sense id="n51527.1" n="1" level="3"> <orth extent="full" lang="la">zēlŏtypus</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, <hi rend="ital">a jealous man</hi>, <bibl default="NO"><author>Petr.</author> 45</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:4:2:30" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 4, 2, 30</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1294,001:1:93:13" default="NO"><author>Mart.</author> 1, 93, 13</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n51527.2" n="2" level="3"> <orth extent="full" lang="la">zēlŏtypa</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, <hi rend="ital">a jealous woman</hi>, <bibl default="NO"><author>Petr.</author> 69</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zelus: <entryFree id="n51528" type="greek" key="ze_lus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zēlus</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zh=los</foreign>, <sense id="n51528.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">zeal</hi>, <hi rend="ital">emulation; jealousy</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1056,001:7 praef" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vitr.</author> 7 praef.</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Prud.</author> Ham. 188</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Aus.</author> Epigr. 77</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Hier.</author> in Gal. 2, 4</bibl>, vv. 17, 18; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0527,004:25:11" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vulg.</author> Num. 25, 11</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zema: <entryFree id="n51529" type="greek" key="ze^ma"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zĕma</orth> or <orth extent="full" lang="la">zŭma</orth>, <itype>ătis</itype>, <gen>n.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">ze/ma</foreign>, <sense id="n51529.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a cooking utensil</hi>, <hi rend="ital">a saucepan</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2003,001:8:1" default="NO"><author>Apic.</author> 8, 1 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl>; Val. ap. Treb. <bibl default="NO"><author>Claud.</author> 14</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Serv.</author> ad Verg. A. 3, 466</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zeno: <entryFree id="n51530" type="main" key="Ze_no"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zēno</orth> or <orth extent="full" lang="la">Zēnon</orth>, <itype>ōnis</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">*zh)nwn</foreign>, <sense id="n51530.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">the name of several Greek philosophers.</hi> </sense><sense id="n51530.1" n="I" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">The founder of the Stoic school</hi>, <hi rend="ital">a native of Cittium in Cyprus;</hi> form Zeno, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0684,001:R. R. 2:1:3" default="NO"><author>Varr.</author> R. R. 2, 1, 3</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,048:3:2:5" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Fin. 3, 2, 5</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">3, 4, 15</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,050:2:22:57" default="NO"><author>id.</author> N. D. 2, 22, 57</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1014,001:Ben. 4:39:1" default="NO"><author>Sen.</author> Ben. 4, 39, 1</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:2:20:7" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 2, 20, 7</bibl>; <cit><quote lang="la">form Zenon,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,049:5:9:27" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Tusc. 5, 9, 27</bibl></cit> B. and K.; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1014,001:Ep. 33:7" default="NO"><author>Sen.</author> Ep. 33, 7</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n51530.2" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">An Eleatic philosopher of Elea</hi>, <hi rend="ital">in Magna Grœcia</hi>, <bibl default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Ac. 2, 42, 129</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,049:2:22:52" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Tusc. 2, 22, 52</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,050:3:33:82" default="NO"><author>id.</author> N. D. 3, 33, 82</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n51530.3" n="III" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">An Epicurean philosopher</hi>, <hi rend="ital">the teacher of Cicero and Atticus</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,048:1:5:16" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Fin. 1, 5, 16</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,050:1:21:59" default="NO"><author>id.</author> N. D. 1, 21, 59</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">1, 33, 93</bibl> sq.; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,049:3:17:38" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Tusc. 3, 17, 38</bibl>.— </sense><sense id="n51530.4" n="IV" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">A Greek emperor in the fifth Christian century.</hi>—Hence, <orth extent="full" lang="la">Zēnōnĭānus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos>, <hi rend="ital">of</hi> or <hi rend="ital">pertaining to the emperor Zeno</hi>, <hi rend="ital">Zenonian</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">lex,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2806,001:Inst. 3:2:3" default="NO"><author>Just.</author> Inst. 3, 2, 3</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
zenobia: <entryFree id="n51531" type="main" key="Ze_no^bi^a"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zēnŏbĭa</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">*zhnobi/a</foreign>, <sense id="n51531.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a queen of Palmyrene</hi>, <hi rend="ital">wife of Odenatus</hi>, <hi rend="ital">conquered by Aurelian</hi>, Treb. Poll. XXX. Tyrann. 14, 23; 14, 29; <bibl default="NO"><author>Vop.</author> Aurel. 22 sq.</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Eutr.</author> 9, 9</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n51531.1" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">Daughter of Mithridates</hi>, <hi rend="ital">king of Armenia</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:12:44" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 12, 44</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">13, 6</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">13, 37</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zephyre: <entryFree id="n51532" type="main" key="Ze^phy^re_"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zĕphyrē</orth>, <itype>ēs</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, <sense id="n51532.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">an island near Crete</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0929,001:2:7" default="NO"><author>Mel.</author> 2, 7</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:4:61" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 4, 12, 20, § 61</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zephyritis: <entryFree id="n51533" type="main" key="Ze^phy^ri_tis"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zĕphyrītis</orth>, <itype>ĭdis</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">*zefuri=tis</foreign>, <sense id="n51533.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">the Zephyritide</hi>, an appellation of Arsinoë, wife of Ptolemaeus Philadelphus, who was honored as a goddess, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0472,001:66:57" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cat.</author> 66, 57</bibl> (cf. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:34:148" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 34, 14, 42, § 148</bibl>).</sense></entryFree>
zephyrius: <entryFree id="n51534" type="greek" key="ze^phy^ri^us"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zĕphyrĭus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos>, = <foreign lang="greek">zefu/rios</foreign>, <sense id="n51534.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">of</hi> or <hi rend="ital">belonging to a zephyr</hi> or <hi rend="ital">to the west wind</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">ova,</quote> <trans>i. e. <tr>wind-eggs</tr>, <tr>addle-eggs</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:10:167" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 10, 60, 80, § 167</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
zephyrus: <entryFree id="n51535" type="main" key="Ze^phy^rus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zĕphyrus</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">*ze/furos</foreign>, <sense id="n51535.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a gentle west wind</hi>, <hi rend="ital">the western breeze</hi>, <hi rend="ital">zephyr</hi> (pure Lat. Favonius); personified, <hi rend="ital">son of Astrœus</hi> <cb n="ZODI" /> <hi rend="ital">and Aurora.</hi> </sense><sense id="n51535.1" n="I" level="1"> <usg type="style">Lit.</usg>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:18:337" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 18, 34, 77, § 337</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,001:3:1:24" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> C. 3, 1, 24</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">4, 7, 9</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> Ep. 1, 7, 13</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,002:1:44" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> G. 1, 44</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:4:223" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> A. 4, 223</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:1:64" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 1, 64</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">1, 108</bibl>; cf. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1014,001:Q. N. 5:16:5" default="NO"><author>Sen.</author> Q. N. 5, 16, 5</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n51535.2" n="II" level="1"> <usg type="style">Poet.</usg>, in gen., <hi rend="ital">wind</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:4:562" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 4, 562</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zeros: <entryFree id="n51536" type="greek" key="zeros"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zeros</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, <sense id="n51536.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a precious stone</hi>, otherwise unknown, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:37:138" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 37, 9, 53, § 138</bibl> (al. leros).</sense></entryFree>
zerynthius: <entryFree id="n51537" type="main" key="Ze_rynthi^us"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zērynthĭus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos>, = <foreign lang="greek">*zhru/nqios</foreign>, <sense id="n51537.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">of</hi> or <hi rend="ital">belonging to the Thracian town of Zerynthus</hi>, <hi rend="ital">Zerynthian</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">litora,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,008:1:10:19" default="NO"><author>Ov.</author> Tr. 1, 10, 19</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Apollo,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:38:41" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 38, 41</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
zeta: <entryFree id="n51538" type="main" key="ze_ta1" n="1"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zēta</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, v. diaeta <sense id="n51538.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">init.</hi></sense></entryFree>

<entryFree id="n51539" type="main" key="ze_ta2" n="2"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zēta</orth>, <itype>indecl.</itype> <gen>n.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zh=ta</foreign>, <sense id="n51539.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">the Greek letter</hi> zeta, <bibl default="NO"><author>Aus.</author> Idyll. Lit. Monos. 12, 11</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zetarius: <entryFree id="n51540" type="main" key="ze_ta_ri^us"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zētārĭus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, = diaetarius, <bibl default="NO"><author>Paul.</author> Sent. 3, 6, 58</bibl>.</entryFree>
zetes: <entryFree id="n51541" type="main" key="Ze_tes"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zētes</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">*zh/ths</foreign>, <sense id="n51541.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a brother of Calăis and son of Boreas</hi>, <hi rend="ital">one of the Argonauts</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:6:716" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 6, 716</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1224,001:1:20:26" default="NO"><author>Prop.</author> 1, 20, 26</bibl>.—Collat. form <orth extent="full" lang="la">Zētus</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>n.</gen>, <bibl default="NO"><author>Serv.</author> ad Verg. A. 10, 350</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zethus: <entryFree id="n51542" type="main" key="Ze_thus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zēthus</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">*zh=qos</foreign>, <sense id="n51542.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a son of Jupiter by Antiopa</hi>, <hi rend="ital">and brother of Amphion</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,037:2:37:155" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> de Or. 2, 37, 155</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,043:1:18:30" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Rep. 1, 18, 30</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Auct. Her.</author> 2, 27, 43</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Hor.</author> Ep. 1, 18, 42</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0533,001:Fab. 76" default="NO"><author>Hyg.</author> Fab. 76</bibl> and 155.</sense></entryFree>
zeugitana: <entryFree id="n51543" type="main" key="Zeugi^ta_na"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zeugĭtāna rĕgio</orth> = <foreign lang="greek">h( *zeugitanh/</foreign>, <sense id="n51543.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a very fruitful district in Africa</hi>, now <hi rend="ital">the northern part of Tunis</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:5:23" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 5, 4, 3, § 23</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Mart. Cap.</author> 6, § 669</bibl>.—Called <orth extent="full" lang="la">Zeugis</orth>, <bibl default="NO"><author>Isid.</author> 14, 5, 8</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zeugites: <entryFree id="n51544" type="greek" key="zeugi_tes"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zeugītes</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zeugi/ths</foreign>, <sense id="n51544.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a kind of reed</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:16:169" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 16, 36, 66, § 169</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zeugma: <entryFree id="n51545" type="main" key="zeugma1" n="1"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zeugma</orth>, <itype>ătis</itype>, <gen>n.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zeu=gma</foreign>, <sense id="n51545.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a grammatical figure</hi>, <hi rend="ital">according to which two nouns or two infinitives are united to a verb which is applicable to only one of them</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0803,001:ad Cic. Verr. 1:18" default="NO"><author>Ascon.</author> ad Cic. Verr. 1, 18</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>

<entryFree id="n51546" type="main" key="Zeugma2" n="2"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zeugma</orth>, <itype>ătis</itype>, <gen>n.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">*zeu=gma</foreign>, <sense id="n51546.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a town in Syria</hi>, <hi rend="ital">on the Euphrates</hi>, now <hi rend="ital">Rumkaleh</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:5:67" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 5, 12, 13, § 67</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:5:86" default="NO" valid="yes">5, 24, 21, § 86</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:34:150" default="NO" valid="yes">34, 15, 43, § 150</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:12:12" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 12, 12</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0917,001:8:237" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Luc.</author> 8, 237</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1020,002:3:2:137" default="NO"><author>Stat.</author> S. 3, 2, 137</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zeus: <entryFree id="n51547" type="greek" key="ze_us"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zēus</orth>, i <gen>m.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zaio/s</foreign>, <sense id="n51547.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a kind of fish</hi> (pure Lat. faber), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:8:16:9" default="NO"><author>Col.</author> 8, 16, 9</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:9:68" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 9, 18, 32, § 68</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zeuxis: <entryFree id="n51548" type="main" key="Zeuxis"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zeuxis</orth>, <itype>is and ĭdis</itype> (<case>acc.</case> -im or -in), <gen>m.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">*ceu=cis</foreign>. <sense id="n51548.0" n="I" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">A famous Greek painter of Heraclea</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:35:65 sq" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 35, 10, 36, § 65 sq.</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,039:18:70" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Brut. 18, 70</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,037:3:7:26" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> de Or. 3, 7, 26</bibl>; <case>acc.</case> Zeuxin, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,036:2:1:1" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Inv. 2, 1, 1</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n51548.1" n="II" level="1"> Zeuxis Blandenius (<hi rend="ital">a native of</hi> Blandos, <hi rend="ital">a city of Phrygia</hi>), <hi rend="ital">a matricide</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,058:1:2:2:section=4 sq" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Q. Fr. 1, 2, 2, § 4 sq.</bibl></sense></entryFree>
zingiberi: <entryFree id="n51549" type="greek" key="zingi^be^ri"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zingĭbĕri</orth> or <orth extent="full" lang="la">zimpĭbĕri</orth>, <itype>indecl.</itype> <gen>n.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">ziggi/beri</foreign>, <sense id="n51549.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">ginger</hi>: Amomum zingiber, Linn.; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:12:27" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 12, 7, 14, § 27</bibl>.—Also <orth extent="full" lang="la">zingĭ-ber</orth>, <itype>ĕris</itype>, <gen>n.</gen>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:5:23" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cels.</author> 5, 23 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Pall.</author> Oct. 20, 2</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2003,001:2:2" default="NO"><author>Apic.</author> 2, 2</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zinzala: <entryFree id="n51550" type="main" key="zinza^la"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zinzăla</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, <sense id="n51550.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a kind of gnat</hi> (rustic Lat.; cf. Span. zenzalo; <cit><quote lang="la">Ital. zanzara),</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Cassiod.</author> in Psa. 104, 31</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
zinzilulo: <entryFree id="n51551" type="main" key="zinzi^lu^lo"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zinzĭlŭlo</orth>, <itype>āre</itype>, <pos>v. n.</pos>, the natural cry of certain birds, <sense id="n51551.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to chirp</hi> (of the regulus, merops, and progne), Auct. Carm. Phil. 43.</sense></entryFree>
zirbus: <entryFree id="n51552" type="main" key="zirbus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zirbus</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, = omentum, <sense id="n51552.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">the caul</hi>, <hi rend="ital">omentum</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2003,001:8:6" default="NO"><author>Apic.</author> 8, 6 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></sense></entryFree>
zizania: <entryFree id="n51553" type="greek" key="zi_za_^ni^a"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zīzā^nĭa</orth>, <itype>ōrum</itype>, <gen>n.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">ziza/nia</foreign>, <sense id="n51553.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">darnel</hi>, <hi rend="ital">cockle</hi>, <hi rend="ital">tares</hi> (eccl. Lat.), <bibl default="NO"><author>Prud.</author> Apoth. 6, 8</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0031,001:13:25" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vulg.</author> Matt. 13, 25</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">13, 26</bibl> sq.; <bibl default="NO"><author>Ambros.</author> in Luc. 8, 49</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zizyphum: <entryFree id="n51554" type="greek" key="zi_zy^phum"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zīzyphum</orth> or <orth extent="full" lang="la">zīzĭphum</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>n.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zi/zufon</foreign>, <sense id="n51554.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">the jujube.</hi> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:15:47" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 15, 14, 14, § 47</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:17:74" default="NO" valid="yes">17, 10, 14, § 74</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:21:51" default="NO" valid="yes">21, 9, 27, § 51</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zizyphus: <entryFree id="n51555" type="greek" key="zi_zy^phus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zīzyphus</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zi/zufos</foreign>, <sense id="n51555.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">the jujube-tree</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:9:4:3" default="NO"><author>Col.</author> 9, 4, 3</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Pall.</author> 5, 4</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zmaragdachates: <entryFree id="n51556" type="main" key="zmaragdachates"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zmaragdachates</orth>, v. smarag-.</entryFree>
zmaragdus: <entryFree id="n51557" type="main" key="zmaragdus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zmaragdus</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, v. smaragdus <sense id="n51557.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">init.</hi></sense></entryFree>
zmaris: <entryFree id="n51558" type="main" key="zmaris"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zmaris</orth>, <itype>ĭdis</itype>, v. smaris.</entryFree>
zmecticus: <entryFree id="n51559" type="main" key="zmecti^cus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zmectĭcus</orth>, v. smecticus.</entryFree>
zmegma: <entryFree id="n51560" type="main" key="zmegma"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zmegma</orth>, v. smegma.</entryFree>
zmilampis: <entryFree id="n51561" type="main" key="zmilampis"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zmilampis</orth>, <itype>is</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, <sense id="n51561.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a precious stone</hi>, otherwise unknown, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:37:185" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 37, 10, 70, § 185</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zmilax: <entryFree id="n51562" type="main" key="zmilax"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zmilax</orth>, v. smilax.</entryFree>
zmintha: <entryFree id="n51563" type="greek" key="zmintha"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zmintha</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, <sense id="n51563.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">an aromatic plant</hi>, <hi rend="ital">a kind of mint</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:19:176" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 19, 10, 57, § 176</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zmyrna: <entryFree id="n51564" type="main" key="Zmyrna"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zmyrna</orth> and <orth extent="full" lang="la">Zmyrnaeus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, v. Smyrn-.</entryFree>
zmyrus: <entryFree id="n51565" type="main" key="zmyrus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zmyrus</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, v. smyrus.</entryFree>
zodiacus: <entryFree id="n51566" type="greek" key="zo_di^a^cus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zōdĭăcus</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zwdiako/s</foreign>, <sense id="n51566.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">the zodiac</hi> (pure Lat. orbis signifer), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,060:chapter=317" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Arat. 317</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1254,001:13:9:6" default="NO"><author>Gell.</author> 13, 9, 6</bibl>.—Hence, <orth extent="full" lang="la">zōdĭăcus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos>, <hi rend="ital">of the zodiac</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">zodiacum diastema,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Sid.</author> Ep. 8, 11</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">zodiacus tractus,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Mart. Cap.</author> 1, § 44</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">zodiaca hospitia,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 1</bibl></cit>, § 5. <pb n="2019" /> <cb n="ZONA" /></sense></entryFree>
zoe: <entryFree id="n51567" type="main" key="Zo_e_"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zōē</orth>, <itype>ēs</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zwh/</foreign> (life), <sense id="n51567.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">one of the Æons of Valentinus</hi>, <bibl default="NO"><author>Tert.</author> adv. Valent. 12</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zoilus: <entryFree id="n51568" type="main" key="Zo_i^lus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zōĭlus</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">*zw/ilos</foreign>, <sense id="n51568.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a severe critic in the time of</hi> Ptolemaeus Philadelphus, <hi rend="ital">a censurer of Homer</hi> (hence called <foreign lang="greek">*(omhroma/stic</foreign>, Homeromastix), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1056,001:7 praef" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vitr.</author> 7 praef.</bibl>— <usg type="style">Transf.</usg>, of <hi rend="ital">a censorious person</hi>, <bibl default="NO"><author>Ov.</author> R. Am. 366</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1294,001:11:37:1" default="NO"><author>Mart.</author> 11, 37, 1</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zomoteganite: <entryFree id="n51569" type="greek" key="zo_mo^te_ga^ni_te_"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zōmŏtēgănītē</orth>, <itype>ēs</itype>, <gen>f.</gen> <etym><foreign lang="greek">zwmo/s-th/ganon</foreign></etym>, <sense id="n51569.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a dish of fish stewed in their own liquor</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2003,001:4:2:section=147" default="NO"><author>Apic.</author> 4, 2, § 147</bibl> dub.</sense></entryFree>
zona: <entryFree id="n51570" type="greek" key="zo_na"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zōna</orth> (<orth extent="full" lang="la">sōna</orth>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,011:5:2:85" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Merc. 5, 2, 85</bibl> Ritschl), <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zw/nh</foreign>, <sense id="n51570.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a belt</hi>, <hi rend="ital">girdle</hi>, <hi rend="ital">zone</hi>, worn about the loins by women (cf. cingulum). </sense><sense id="n51570.1" n="I" level="1"> <usg type="style">Lit.</usg>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0472,001:2:13" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cat.</author> 2, 13</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,007:2:320" default="NO"><author>Ov.</author> F. 2, 320</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,002:2:116" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> H. 2, 116</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:5:470" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> M. 5, 470</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">10, 379</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> R. Am. 602</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,001:1:7:48 al" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Am. 1, 7, 48 al.</bibl>—</sense><sense id="n51570.2" n="II" level="1"> <usg type="style">Transf.</usg> </sense><sense id="n51570.3" n="A" level="2"> <hi rend="ital">A girdle</hi> worn by men for containing money, <hi rend="ital">a money-belt</hi> (cf. crumena), C. Gracch. ap. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1254,001:15:12" default="NO"><author>Gell.</author> 15, 12 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Hor.</author> Ep. 2, 2, 40</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n51570.4" n="B" level="2"> <hi rend="ital">The girdle</hi> or <hi rend="ital">belt of Orion</hi>, a constellation, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,007:6:787" default="NO"><author>Ov.</author> F. 6, 787</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n51570.5" n="C" level="2"> <hi rend="ital">A line running around the edge of a gem</hi>, <hi rend="ital">a girdle</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:37:90" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 37, 6, 24, § 90</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n51570.6" n="D" level="2"> <hi rend="ital">One of the imaginary circles which divided the earth into five climates</hi>, <hi rend="ital">a zone</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,002:1:233" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> G. 1, 233</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:1:46" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 1, 46</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">2, 131</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:2:172" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 2, 68, 68, § 172</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0929,001:1:1:2" default="NO"><author>Mel.</author> 1, 1, 2</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Macr.</author> Somn. Scip. 1, 15, 13</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">2, 5, 20</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Mart. Cap.</author> 6, § 602</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n51570.7" n="E" level="2"> <hi rend="ital">A kind of herpes</hi> or <hi rend="ital">erysipelas</hi>, which spreads about the body like a girdle, and destroys life, <hi rend="ital">the shingles;</hi> called also zoster, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1011,001:Comp. 63" default="NO"><author>Scrib.</author> Comp. 63</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zonalis: <entryFree id="n51571" type="main" key="zo_na_lis"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zōnālis</orth>, <itype>e</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos> <etym>zona, II. D.</etym>, <sense id="n51571.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">of</hi> or <hi rend="ital">belonging to a zone</hi> (of the earth): <cit><quote lang="la">ambitus,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Macr.</author> Somn. Scip. 2, 5 <hi rend="ital">med.</hi></bibl></cit></sense></entryFree>
zonarius: <entryFree id="n51572" type="main" key="zo_na_ri^us"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zōnārĭus</orth> (<orth type="alt" extent="full" lang="la">sōnārĭus</orth>), <itype>a, um</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos> <etym>zona</etym>, <sense id="n51572.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">of</hi> or <hi rend="ital">belonging to a belt</hi> or <hi rend="ital">girdle.</hi> </sense><sense id="n51572.1" n="I" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">Adj.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">sector,</quote> <trans><tr>a cutpurse</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,019:4:2:20" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Trin. 4, 2, 20</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n51572.2" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">Subst.</hi>: <orth extent="full" lang="la">zōnārĭus</orth>, <itype>ii</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, <hi rend="ital">a maker of girdles</hi>, <bibl default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Fl. 7, 17</bibl>; Lucil. ap. <bibl default="NO"><author>Non.</author> p. 2, 379</bibl> (Sat. Fr. 30, 16). <cb n="ZOST" /></sense></entryFree>
zonatim: <entryFree id="n51573" type="hapax" key="zo_na_tim"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zōnātim</orth>, <pos>adv.</pos> <etym>zona</etym>, <sense id="n51573.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">round about</hi>, <hi rend="ital">in a circle</hi>, Lucil. ap. <bibl default="NO"><author>Non.</author> p. 189, 33</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zone: <entryFree id="n51574" type="main" key="Zo_ne_"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zōnē</orth>, <itype>ēs</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, <sense id="n51574.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a promontory of Thrace</hi>, <hi rend="ital">opposite to Thasos</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0929,001:2:2" default="NO"><author>Mel.</author> 2, 2</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:4:43" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 4, 11, 18, § 43</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zonula: <entryFree id="n51575" type="main" key="zo_nu^la"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zōnŭla</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>f.</gen> <lbl>dim.</lbl> <etym>zona</etym>, <sense id="n51575.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a little girdle</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0472,001:61:53" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cat.</author> 61, 53</bibl>; Seren. ap. <bibl default="NO"><author>Non.</author> p. 539, 19</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Lampr.</author> Alex. Sev. 52</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zoophorus: <entryFree id="n51576" type="greek" key="zo_opho^rus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zōophŏrus</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zwofo/ros</foreign>. <sense id="n51576.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">the frieze</hi> of a column (between the epistylium and the coronis), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1056,001:3:5:10" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vitr.</author> 3, 5, 10</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1056,001:4:1:2" default="NO" valid="yes">4, 1, 2</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zoophthalmos: <entryFree id="n51577" type="greek" key="zo_ophthalmos"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zōophthalmos</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zwo/fqalmos</foreign>, <sense id="n51577.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">great houseleek</hi>, <hi rend="ital">called also</hi> aizoum majus, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:25:160" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 25, 13, 102, § 160</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zopissa: <entryFree id="n51578" type="greek" key="zo_pissa"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zōpissa</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zw/pissa</foreign>, <sense id="n51578.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">pitch mixed with wax</hi>, <hi rend="ital">which was scraped off from ships</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:16:56" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 16, 12, 23, § 56</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:24:41" default="NO" valid="yes">24, 7, 26, § 41</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zopyron: <entryFree id="n51579" type="greek" key="zo_py^ron"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zōpyron</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>n.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zwpuro/n</foreign>, <sense id="n51579.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a plant</hi>, <hi rend="ital">called also</hi> clinopodion, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:24:137" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 24, 15, 87, § 137</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zopyrus: <entryFree id="n51580" type="main" key="Zo_py^rus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zōpyrus</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">*zw/puros</foreign>. <sense id="n51580.0" n="I" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">A celebrated physiognomist</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,054:5:10" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Fat. 5, 10</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,049:4:37:80" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Tusc. 4, 37, 80</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n51580.1" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">A Persian noble</hi>, <hi rend="ital">who mutilated himself and thereby helped to conquer Babylon</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2806,001:1:10:15" default="NO"><author>Just.</author> 1, 10, 15</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n51580.2" n="III" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">A rhetorician</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:3:6:3" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 3, 6, 3</bibl>.—Hence, perh., </sense><sense id="n51580.3" n="1" level="3"> <orth extent="full" lang="la">Zōpyrion</orth>, Lucil. ap. <bibl default="NO"><author>Non.</author> p. 210, 28</bibl>.— </sense><sense id="n51580.4" n="2" level="3"> <orth extent="full" lang="la">Zōpyriātim</orth>, <pos>adv.</pos>, <hi rend="ital">in the manner of Zopyrus</hi>, Lucil. ap. <bibl default="NO"><author>Non.</author> p. 455, 17</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zoranisceos: <entryFree id="n51581" type="main" key="zoranisceos"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zoranisceos</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, <sense id="n51581.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a precious stone</hi>, otherwise unknown, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:37:185" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 37, 10, 70, § 185</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zoroastres: <entryFree id="n51582" type="main" key="Zo_ro^astres"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zōrŏastres</orth>, <itype>is</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, <sense id="n51582.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">Zoroaster</hi>, <hi rend="ital">a lawgiver of the Medes</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2806,001:1:1:9" default="NO"><author>Just.</author> 1, 1, 9</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:30:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 30, 1, 2, § 3</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>App.</author> Mag. p. 291</bibl>.—Hence, <orth extent="full" lang="la">Zōrŏ-astrēus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos>, <hi rend="ital">of</hi> or <hi rend="ital">belonging to Zoroaster</hi>, <hi rend="ital">Zoroastrian</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">susurri,</quote> <trans>i. e. <tr>magical</tr>,</trans> <bibl default="NO"><author>Prud.</author> Apoth. 494</bibl></cit> (where Zŏr-, by solecism).</sense></entryFree>
zoster: <entryFree id="n51583" type="greek" key="zoster1" n="1"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zoster</orth>, <itype>ēris</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zwsth/r</foreign> (a girdle). <cb n="ZYTH" /> <sense id="n51583.0" n="I" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">A kind of herpes</hi>, <hi rend="ital">the shingles</hi> (cf. zona, II. E.), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:26:121" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 26, 11, 74, § 121</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n51583.1" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">A kind of sca shrub</hi> (<hi rend="ital">called also</hi> prason), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:13:135" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 13, 25, 48, § 135</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>

<entryFree id="n51584" type="main" key="Zoster2" n="2"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zoster</orth>, <itype>ēris</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, <sense id="n51584.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a promontory</hi>, <hi rend="ital">town</hi>, <hi rend="ital">and harbor of Attica;</hi> the promontory is now called <hi rend="ital">C. Lombarda</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,057:5:12" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Att. 5, 12 <hi rend="ital">init.</hi></bibl></sense></entryFree>
zotheca: <entryFree id="n51585" type="greek" key="zo_the_ca"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zōthēca</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zwqh/kh</foreign>. <sense id="n51585.0" n="I" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">A little private chamber</hi>, <hi rend="ital">closet</hi>, or <hi rend="ital">cabinet</hi>, for reposing in by day (cf. conclave), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1318,001:2:17:21" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> Ep. 2, 17, 21</bibl>; cf. zothecula.—</sense><sense id="n51585.1" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">A recess</hi>, <hi rend="ital">niche</hi>, for religious purposes, <bibl default="NO"><author>Inscr. Orell.</author> 1368</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">2006</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">3889</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zothecula: <entryFree id="n51586" type="main" key="zo_the_cu^la"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zōthēcŭla</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>f.</gen> <lbl>dim.</lbl> <etym>zotheca, I.</etym>, <sense id="n51586.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a little closet</hi> or <hi rend="ital">cabinet</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1318,001:5:6:38" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> Ep. 5, 6, 38</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Sid.</author> Ep. 8, 16</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">9, 11</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zura: <entryFree id="n51587" type="foreign" key="zura"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zura</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>f.</gen> <etym>African</etym>, <sense id="n51587.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">the seed of the Christ's-thorn</hi> (paliurus), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:24:115" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 24, 13, 71, § 115</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zygia: <entryFree id="n51588" type="greek" key="zy^gi^a1" n="1"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zygĭa</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zugi/a</foreign> (prop. an <pos>adj.</pos> from <foreign lang="greek">zu/gios</foreign>, belonging to or fit for yokes). <sense id="n51588.0" n="I" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">A tree</hi>, <hi rend="ital">called also</hi> carpinus, <hi rend="ital">horn-beam</hi>: Carpinus betulus, Linn.; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:16:67" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 16, 15, 26, § 67</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n51588.1" n="II" level="1"> Zygia tibia, <hi rend="ital">a nuptial</hi> or <hi rend="ital">marriage flute</hi>, <bibl default="NO"><author>App.</author> M. 4, p. 157, 37</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>

<entryFree id="n51589" type="main" key="Zygia2" n="2"><orth extent="full" lang="la">Zygia</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, <sense id="n51589.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a name of Juno</hi>, as the goddess of marriage, <bibl default="NO"><author>App.</author> M. 6, p. 174, 38</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zygis: <entryFree id="n51590" type="greek" key="zy^gis"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zygis</orth>, <itype>ĭdis</itype>, <gen>f.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zugi/s</foreign>, <sense id="n51590.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">wild thyme</hi>, <bibl default="NO"><author>App.</author> Herb. 99</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zygostasium: <entryFree id="n51591" type="greek" key="zy^gosta^si^um"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zygostăsĭum</orth>, <itype>ii</itype>, <gen>n.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zugo/stasis</foreign>, <sense id="n51591.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">the office of a weigh-master</hi>, Cod. Th. 15, 26, 1.</sense></entryFree>
zygostates: <entryFree id="n51592" type="greek" key="zy^gosta^tes"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zygostătes</orth>, <itype>ae</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zugosta/ths</foreign>, <sense id="n51592.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a master of the weights</hi>, <hi rend="ital">weigh-master</hi>, Cod. Th. 12, 7, 2; <bibl default="NO"><author>Cod. Just.</author> 10, 71, 2</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
zythum: <entryFree id="n51593" type="greek" key="zythum"><orth extent="full" lang="la">zythum</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>n.</gen>, = <foreign lang="greek">zu=qos</foreign>, <sense id="n51593.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a kind of malt-liquor</hi> among the Egyptians, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:22:164" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 22, 25, 82, § 164</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:10:116" default="NO"><author>Col.</author> 10, 116</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2806,001:33:6:9 praef" default="NO"><author>Dig.</author> 33, 6, 9 praef.</bibl> </sense></entryFree>
